attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not feel lowering the voting age to 16 is a sensible idea at all. I do not feel 16 is the age where such responsibility which has a direct impact on who runs the country should be given. Also on a pettier note I am 21 and I wanted to vote at 16 but couldn't; so keep the age at 18

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
